广告牌 https://www.billboard.com音乐图表，新闻，照片和视频THU，2025年3月27日12:45:24 +0000 En-us小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.5.5 200641670 Ella Langley顶级2025 ACM奖提名：完整列表https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/2025-acm-awards-nominations-full-list-1235931959/Paul Grein Thu, 27 Mar 2025 12:45:00 +0000 AwardsMusicacademy of country music awardsACM Awardsgenre country https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235931959 Cody Johnson, Morgan Wallen and Lainey Wilson were close behind with seven nods. Chris Stapleton had six.

埃拉·兰利（Ella Langley）是2025年乡村音乐学院奖的领先提名人。她的八个点头中有六个是“你看起来像你爱我”，她与莱利·格林（Riley Green）的热门合作 - 年度单曲，年度音乐赛事，年度歌曲（作为艺术家和词曲作者）和年度视觉媒体（作为艺术家和导演）。

有关的

布莱克·谢尔顿（Eric Church）和莱尼·威尔逊（Lainey Wilson）将在2025 ACM奖中表演

03/24/2025

性感的二重奏在11月的CMA奖上赢得了今年的音乐赛事。它在Billboard的Country Airplay排行榜上排名第一，在Hot Country歌曲中排名第七，在全类Billboard Hot 100中排名第30。25岁的Langley也获得了年度女性艺术家和年度最佳女性艺术家的提名。

科迪·约翰逊（Cody Johnson） ， 摩根·沃伦（Morgan Wallen）和莱尼·威尔逊（Lainey Wilson）以七个点头紧随其后。 克里斯·斯塔普尔顿（Chris Stapleton）有六个。绿色和邮政马龙各有五个。 Kelsea Ballerini有四个，其中包括她对年度艺人的第一次点头。

首次闯入大门类别的其他艺术家包括获得年度二人组提名的Muscadine Bloodline和《红粘土》（Red Clay Strays） ，被提名为年度小组。后一种法案被提名为两个奖项，比今年其他正在进行的小组或二人组提名。

Zach Top的首张专辑《 Cill Beer＆Country Music 》获得了年度专辑的提名。这标志着自2016年以来，斯塔普尔顿的旅行者和山姆·亨特（Sam Hunt）的蒙特瓦洛（Montevallo）都获得了提名，这是首次发行首张专辑。 （旅行者赢得。）

Post Malone的“我有帮助”，其中包括Wallen，被提名为“单身”，以及“您看起来像您爱我”。这是三年来第二次在同一年中提名两次合作命中。 Carly Pearce＆Ashley McBryde的“从来没有想成为那个女孩”，凯特·布朗（Katelyn Brown）和凯特·布朗（Katelyn Brown）的“感谢上帝”都在2023年提名。

去年的许多获奖者都重返同一类别的防守，包括威尔逊（Wilson），去年的年度艺人和年度女性艺术家都获得了冠军。 Stapleton（年度最佳男性艺术家）， Dan + Shay （年度最佳二人组）， Old Dominion （年度最佳小组）和Jessie Jo Dillon （年度歌曲作者）。

这是卢克·科姆斯（Luke Combs）连续第六年获得年度男性艺术家和年度艺人的提名。他尚未在后一类中获胜。如果他今年最终将其带回家，他将获得ACM的三冠王奖，该奖项包括在适当的新艺术家和艺术家类别以及年度艺人中的胜利。 Combs在2019年赢得了年度最佳男性艺术家和次年的年度男性艺术家。过去的ACM三级冠军奖获得者包括Wilson，Stapleton，Miranda Lambert，Jason Aldean，Carrie Underwood和Kenny Chesney。

小大镇（Little Big Town）获得了年度小组的第19次提名，这仅仅是将阿拉巴马州长期以来的纪录与该类别历史上最突出的记录相提并论。小镇小镇于2006年获得了该类别的第一项提名，同年阿拉巴马州获得了第20名和最后的命中。 （那年没有赢得比赛。该奖项授予了Rascal Flatts。）

Rascal Flatts在第13次被提名为年度小组，这是自2017年以来的第一次。

老Dominion连续第10年被提名为年度小组。在过去的七年中，该小组每年都获得了该奖项。如果他们今年再次获胜，他们将超过Rascal Flatts，这是该类别中最多的胜利。 （如果Rascal Flatts获胜，那么他们而不是旧的统治，将成为该类别历史上最获胜的小组。）

Brooks＆Dunn在第16次获得年度二人组提名。他们在11月的CMA奖上赢得了该类别的胜利，击败了最近的最爱Dan + Shay和Osborne兄弟。 Dan + Shay连续第12年获得ACM奖的年度二人组提名。奥斯本兄弟连续第11年跑步。

Stapleton连续第10次获得年度男性艺术家的提名，这是他赢得四次的奖项。 Stapleton第七次也被提名为年度艺人。

凯西·穆斯格雷夫斯（Kacey Musgraves）获得了年度女艺术家的第九名提名。她在2019年获胜。芭蕾舞女演员第八次获得提名。她尚未赢得这一类别。

贝利·齐默尔曼（Bailey Zimmerman）在两年前被提名为年度新男性艺术家，他今年再次入围该类别。 （ACM规则允许艺术家在Newcomer Awards上进行两次尝试。） Kassi Ashton和Ashley Cooke连续第二年被提名为年度最佳新女艺术家。 焦躁不安的道路连续第二年被提名为新二人组或年度小组。

查理·英俊（Charlie Hindome）正在与自己竞争年度专辑。他被提名为Jelly Roll的精美破碎和Malone的F-1万亿的制作人。同样， 达斯汀·汉尼（Dustin Haney）正在与自己竞争年度视觉媒体，作为科迪·约翰逊（Cody Johnson）的“污垢便宜”的制片人/导演，也是约翰逊（Johnson）和凯莉·安德伍德（Johnson＆Carrie Underwood）的“我要爱你”的导演。

词曲作者兼制片人Alysa Vanderheym以与Ballerini的合作而闻名，他成为第一位获得年度ACM提名的女性。女性生产者正在缓慢但肯定在这个男性主导的领域中进攻。在今年的格莱美奖中，艾莉西亚·本文斯特（Alissia Benveniste）（仅以她的名字命名），成为六年来第一位获得年度最佳制片人致敬的女性。她的荣誉包括与Jamila Woods，Rae Khalil和BJ芝加哥儿童的合作。

第60届ACM奖的资格期是1月1日至2024年12月31日。在五个类别中，如果艺术家也被称为制片人，导演或词曲作者，则可能会获得多个提名。

第60届ACM奖由Reba Mcentire主持，将于5月8日，星期四，美国东部时间晚上8点 /晚上7点 /下午7点CT / 5 pm从Texco的Texco的福特中心（Ford Center）播放Prime Video和Amazon Music Channel，在Twitch上直播。有限的门票有限，可在Seat Seat Geek上购买60届ACM奖项。

第60届国家音乐学院奖是由Dick Clark Productions（DCP）制作的。拉吉·卡普尔（Raj Kapoor）是执行制片人和演艺人员，帕特里克·芒顿（Patrick Menton）是联合执行制片人。 Damon Whiteside是乡村音乐学院的执行制片人，Jay Penske和Barry Adelman担任DCP的执行制片人。约翰·萨德（John Saade）还将继续担任亚马逊米高梅工作室（Amazon MGM Studios）的咨询制作人。

以下是主要奖项，录音室录音奖和行业奖项类别的提名的完整列表：

; 1235931959 贾斯汀·比伯（Justin Bieber）的7个月大儿子杰克·布鲁斯（Jack Blues）抓住了爸爸的耳朵https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/justin-bieber-son-jack-blues-grabs-dads-close-close-pic-1235932434/Gil Kaufman Thu, 27 Mar 2025 12:43:32 +0000 MusicPopgenre popMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932434 You can't see the little guy's face, but you can clearly feel the love.

在工作室最近拍摄的照片之间，贾斯汀·比伯（Justin Bieber）在星期四早上（3月27日）花了一些时间与他和妻子海莉·比伯（Hailey Bieber）的七个月大儿子杰克·布鲁斯（Jack Blues）一起发布了一些可爱的快照。在旋转木马的第一张图像中，比伯头的后部遮住了蹒跚学步的脸，尽管可以看到杰克的矮胖的手抓住了他父亲的耳朵。

有关的

Blackpink的Lisa说，她“太害羞”了，无法告诉贾斯汀·比伯她有多少…

03/24/2025

随后的幻灯片包括一堆鲜艳的织物色板，海莉摇晃着红色的运动衫，匹配的绑腿组合，与两个女人聊天，另一个放大了杰克躺在地板上的毛巾上的图片 - 再次抓住了这位31岁的歌手的脸 - 沐浴后似乎是在沐浴后。

比伯（Bieber）在帖子上加上了“我的狂热表情，耸耸肩的表情符号”的帖子标题。迄今为止，这对夫妇还没有发布任何可见杰克脸的图像。

不过，这并不全是爸爸的职责。随后的幻灯片捕捉了一个赤膊的比伯在工作室里工作鼓垫，然后是脸色的颗粒状特写，他戴着一个模糊的蓝色帽子和粉红色的运动衫，以及一张模糊的照片，一张模糊不清的照片是，他在壁炉前行走的一个模糊的妇女。

在2022年和2023年处理拉姆齐·亨特（Ramsay Hunt）综合症的影响时，比伯（Bieber）最近在2022年和2023年进行了一段时间后，最近在录音室中发布了一系列图像。英国艺术家塞孔（Sekou）上周也参加了动作，当时他在唱片会议上发布了一个Instagram故事，并再次以弗雷德（Fred）为特色。

然后，在星期六，比伯分享了一部Insta视频， 其中涉及工作室的果酱会议，并以反思性的评论为近三分钟的剪辑加上了字幕。他写道：“当我感到自己开始变得不真实时，我有时会讨厌自己。” “然后我记得我们所有人都被迫认为我们还不够，但是当我改变自己以取悦人们时，我仍然讨厌。”在剪辑中标记的朋友和音乐家中有歌手兼作词人詹森·麦克雷（Jensen McRae），犹大·史密斯（Judah Smith）牧师，乔什·梅尔（Josh Mehl），DJ Taylor James，制片人Camper等。

最近的活动再次使人们对这位歌手越来越接近他的最后一个全长项目，即2021年的Billboard 200 No.1 Justice专辑感到兴奋。发稿时，比伯尚未确认其下一位唱片的头衔或发行日期。

; 1235932434 埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）揭示了下一张专辑的标题，Talks不断为蕾哈娜（Rihanna）写歌，并在“今晚秀”上播放“旧电话” https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/pop/Ed-sheeran-title-next-next-album-play-write-writing-ngriting-nongs-rihanna-fallon-1235932422/Gil Kaufman Thu, 27 Mar 2025 12:09:12 +0000 MusicPopgenre popMusic Newstonight show starring jimmy fallon https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932422 Ed also showed Jimmy Fallon how a loop pedal works on Wednesday's (March 26) show.

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）在星期三晚上（3月26日）访问今晚秀时，有很多事情要谈论。 In addition to finally revealing the title of his upcoming album, the singer also described the globe-trotting trip he took to record his new single, “ Azizam ,” gave host Jimmy Fallon a live demo of his famous loop pedal set-up, talked about his eternal quest to land a song on a Rihanna album and joked about topping his Tartantino-inspired 10-album career arc with a final life-spanning LP called Eject 。

有关的

埃德·希兰（Ed Sheeran）透露了他的新专辑是“完成的”，同时首映主张单曲Azizam的片段…

03/19/2025

哇。

Sheeran解释说，他的新歌的标题在波斯语的启发下转化为“ My Dear”，其灵感来自波斯的制作人Illya Salmanzadeh。 Sheeran说：“我们正在创作很多音乐，他建议我们在波斯文化中创造一些东西。”他指出，他们在法尔西也做了完整的版本。这首歌最近在新奥尔良的一场弹出式节目中进行了现场处女作，Sheeran与二线Soul Rebels Brass Band一起参加了比赛。

尽管这首歌最初是在波斯的参考框架中创作的，但Sheeran说，长大后听到许多传统的爱尔兰音乐使他意识到了两种文化的节奏非常相似，但在不同的乐器上进行了演奏。因此，当他在中国与古典音乐家一起工作时，他与传统的中国音乐家一起录制了版本，然后与纳什维尔的印度音乐家，爱尔兰音乐家和蓝草演奏者一起做了同样的事情。

Sheeran说：“音乐是一种通用语言，即使它都是不同的语言。”

Sheeran终于确认了他即将发行的专辑被称为Play ，并且在他的数学专辑系列之后，其中包括五个录音室唱片 - + （2011）， X （2014）， ÷ （2017）， = （2021），=（2023）和- （2023 ） - 他的下一个运行是基于他在18岁时的想法。 ，快进并停止。

“我有点痴迷于[Quentin] Tartantino，我听说他正在拍10部电影，并且他正在做他的附带项目……所以我想做10部电影，并在这里和那里做一个附带项目。”当法伦（Fallon）问雪兰（Sheeran）是否会在停止后挂上它时，这位歌手说，他还在玩弄一张专辑的想法，其中包括一生中写的未发行的歌曲，然后在他去世的那一天发行。

Sheeran还描述了他是如何受到年轻的爱尔兰歌手/词曲作者加里·邓恩（Gary Dunne）的启发，并在myspace上给英雄发了邮件，以了解如何使用循环踏板。然后，他进入了今晚的表演舞台，展示了他如何建立“你的形状”，吉米提供了高“哦，我，哦，我，哦，我”的支持人声。他还分享了印度的一段视频，在其中播放了Billboard Hot 100 No. 1 No.1歌曲。

Sheeran并非一无所有，Sheeran说“您的形状”最初是为蕾哈娜（Rihanna）撰写的，每当他为一张专辑做新歌时，他总是在他的一边工作，希望她会选择。他说：“蕾哈娜（Rihanna）在任何人中都拥有最佳的口味。”他可能再次为这位歌手的神话般的第九张专辑拍摄了自己的镜头，同时指出他的贾斯汀·比伯（Justin Bieber）热门单曲“ Love Yourself”最初是为Rihrih撰写的。 “她总是选择非常非常好的歌曲。”

Sheeran总是很忙，描述了他在星期五（3月28日）开始在马萨诸塞州伊普斯维奇举办的弹出窗口，为期两天的酒吧，粉丝们可以通过上旧手机并发送有意义的视频或消息来进入。然后，这些消息将投影到酒吧的墙壁上，以拍摄音乐视频。当然，Sheeran还播放了启发酒吧“ Old Phone”的歌曲，这是第二次直播Fallon的喜悦。

法伦（Fallon）和希兰（Sheeran）还嘲笑了最近录制了主持人伪装的地铁街头散布钻头之一，并指出，埃德（Ed）为惊讶的纽约通勤者（Chappell Roan Roan）的“ Pink Pony Club”做了一个杀手loder的封面。

在下面的今晚节目中观看Sheeran。

; 1235932422 《 ivaneccence的艾米·李https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/evanescence-afterlife-devil-may-may-cry-netflix-netflix-soundtrack-1235931411/Rania Aniftos Thu, 27 Mar 2025 12:00:00 +0000 MusicMusic Newsgenre rockTV/Film https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235931411 The video-game-inspired show premieres on April 3.

消失已经进入了魔鬼梅哭泣的动画世界。

摇滚乐队根据流行的Capcom视频游戏为即将推出的Netflix动画系列贡献了新的曲目“来世”。从表演主持人兼执行制片人阿迪·尚卡（Adi Shankar）中，该节目的描述写着：“险恶的力量正在发挥打开人类和恶魔领域之间的门户。在其中，这一切都是丹特（Dante），是一个孤儿的猎犬，却没有意识到，他的脖子上的命运却挂在他的脖子上。”

Evanescence的艾米·李（Amy Lee）与Mako（真名Alex Seaver）一起写了“来世”，尽管她以前不熟悉Devil May Cry系列，但她告诉Billboard ：“我绝对喜欢这场演出，艺术和故事。”

她补充说：“我一直很喜欢好的动漫。从节目的第一个场景开始，我就知道它会很好。富有创造力，发人深省，恐怖和美丽，经典。”

至于“来世”，李说，她想通过Mako，Nick Raskulinecz和Tyler Demorest生产的曲目来捕捉一种特殊的感觉。 “对我来说，这首歌既是痛苦又是决心。从一个失去了如此多的人的角度来看，它将始终带有这一点的印记，而且还可以超越恐惧的观点。没有屈服，毫不犹豫，毫不犹豫，当您承诺打架并没有剩下任何遗失时，您的追求毫不犹豫。”

同时，Shankar立即知道逃生非常适合魔鬼可能会哭泣的音乐宇宙。他说：“艾米和她的小队拥有这个空间。逃生雕刻了整个情感景观。” “他们的声音是炼金术 - 哥特式的宏伟遇到了原始的脆弱性，电影和幻想的融合。艾米·李（Amy Lee）是一个频率直接伸向灵魂的频率。艾米·李（Amy Lee）的声音带来了痛苦，力量和超越性的方式。

Shankar将Devil May哭泣为“忧郁的摇滚莎士比亚悲剧，这是命运，损失和对救赎的无情追求之间的歌剧舞蹈，并指出“来世”与“两个关键的叙事线程”引起了“几个“几个”季节的“几个”季节，这是“几个”季节第1个情节曲折。该节目主持人说：“创伤不仅仅是一个事件；这是一种痕迹，及时的裂缝，心理永远不会停止试图修补。” “当孩子的一部分因伤心欲绝而死亡时，成年自我被判处无休止的追求 - 试图恢复丢失的东西，以治愈伤口，以他们可能永远无法完全理解的方式塑造了伤口。从这个意义上说，“来世”不仅是故事中的一首歌；这是灵魂曾经是曾经是的，也许是什么，也许是什么，也许仍然可以。”

通过下面的广告牌观看专门观看“来世”音乐视频。魔鬼可能哭泣于4月3日在Netflix上首映。

; 1235931411 Huey P. Williams是杰克逊南部女星的备受喜爱的首席歌手，死于80 https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/huey-p-williams-jackson-southernaires-dies-dies-80-1235932407/Jessica Lynch Thu, 27 Mar 2025 07:19:23 +0000 MusicMusic Newsobit https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932407 The singer's passing marks the end of an era for quartet gospel — a style he helped define and preserve for over five decades.

休伊·威廉姆斯（Huey P. Williams）是3月24日，杰克逊南部女星的长期主持人，也是美国福音音乐的基石，他在密西西比州史密斯代尔的家中和平地死亡。他80岁。

威廉姆斯（Williams）无误的声音和深情的讲故事，是传统福音的开拓者，使他成为该类型中最受欢迎的歌手之一。他的过世标志着四重奏福音的时代的终结 - 他帮助定义和保存了五十年的风格。

威廉姆斯出生于福音皇室家庭。他是弗兰克·威廉姆斯（Frank Williams）的哥哥，后来成立了密西西比州大众合唱团，以及格莱美提名的威廉姆斯兄弟的梅尔文，道格和伦纳德·威廉姆斯的成员。威廉姆斯家族一起帮助塑造了现代福音的声音。

道格说：“在我看来，我的大哥哥休（Huey）处于自己的联盟​​中。” “他拥有一个毫无意义的签名声音。多年来，他的音乐部以一种积极的方式触动了如此多的生活。他的性格很大。但是，他的性格很大，但是如此谦虚的精神。休伊是一个人的人的表现，一个爱每个人的男人，一个爱每个人，从不遇到一个宿杀者，从不遇到一个遗憾的人，他会在他的身上丧命。他的恋爱者是他的许多人，他俩都愿意与他人的陪伴。那个善良的人是众所周知的。不可否认的遗产将永远存在。”

杰克逊南部女星（Jackson Southernaes）于1940年在密西西比州的杰克逊（Jackson）成立，并于1960年代在休伊（Huey）和弗兰克·威廉姆斯（Frank Williams）的领导下以及威利·班克斯（Willie Banks）获得了全国关注。 1963年，他们与孔雀子公司Song Bird Records签约，并发行了他们的突破单曲“最伟大的创作者”。

他们1968年的歌曲“ To To Tooth”成为了巨大的热门歌曲，并导致了他们的第一张全长专辑的发行。南方人以情感强大的表演和信仰和毅力的信息而闻名，他以“不要让他抓住您（无工作）和“它将持续多久”等广播收藏夹赢得了广播。

1975年，该小组成为与马拉科唱片公司（Malaco Records）签约的第一个福音行为，建立了长达数十年的伙伴关系，使他们在Billboard的顶级福音专辑榜上定期与Down Home （1975年），传奇绅士（1979年）等标题榜单，我们需要您的祝福（1985年）。他们经常在Billboard的年度最佳福音/灵魂艺术家中提名。

休伊对福音的承诺从未动摇。当被问及他是否要退休时，他著名地回答说：“我对这个问题的回答是，你如何放弃上帝？你如何放弃福音？你怎么说，'我要退休？'这就像一场良好的婚姻 - 直到死亡使我们分开。”

The Jackson Southernaires won multiple accolades, including three consecutive Gospel Music Workshop of America awards for Traditional Male Group of the Year in the late '80s, a Stellar Award in 1989, and a Grammy nomination in 1992. They were inducted into the Mississippi Musicians Hall of Fame, and in 2010, the city of Jackson renamed a stretch of road in their honor: Jackson Southernaires Drive.

威廉姆斯（Williams）在该小组的最后表演是在2024年底，这证明了他对福音的持久热情。庆祝活动将于3月29日在密西西比州麦考姆的Fernwood MB教堂举行。

当休伊被问及退休时，他说：“我对这个问题的回答是，你如何放弃上帝？你怎么放弃福音？你怎么说，'我要退休？'这就像一场良好的婚姻，直到死亡使我们分开。”

威廉姆斯（Williams）的兄弟姐妹，大家庭和一群粉丝得以幸存，他们的声音振奋人心。

; 1235932407 肯德里克·拉马尔（Kendrick Lamar）的超级碗半场表演收到了125 FCC投诉https://www.billboard.com/music/rb-hip-hop/kendrick-lamar-super-bowl-halftime-show-halftime-show-125-fcc-complaints-1235932402/Jessica Lynch Thu, 27 Mar 2025 06:16:23 +0000 MusicR&B/Hip-Hopgenre hip-hopMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932402 Several viewers cited Lamar’s lyrics, choreography, and guest appearances as points of concern.

肯德里克·拉马尔（Kendrick Lamar）历史悠久的超级碗半场表现可能打破了唱片，但它也使一些羽毛折断了。

根据山上新获得的报告，这位赢得格莱美奖的说唱歌手在超级碗利克斯（Super Bowl Lix）的出现向联邦通信委员会（FCC）提出了125个正式投诉。投诉范围从指控表演是“挑衅性的舞蹈”到“种族主义”和“帮派隶属关系”的主张，几位观众以拉马尔的歌词，编舞和嘉宾演出为关注点。

2月9日的演出使拉马尔成为第一个标题为超级碗半场表演的独奏说唱歌手，其中包括他备受赞誉的唱片和最近的专辑GNX的削减，其中包括他对Drake的广泛宣传的Diss曲目的审查版本“ Not Like Use ”。

一位观众写道，他们的孩子“不应该受到看和听语言和手势的看法，”另一个观众说：“在可能的家庭活动中必须将孩子送出房间是因为可能的粗俗和不适当的语言/手势而感到厌烦。”

Another complaint criticized the show for being “divisive, downgrading, and filled with profanity,” while others took issue with the racial composition of the performance. One viewer wrote, “There wasn't one white person in the whole show. They get away with it but if it was all white it would be a different story… This was a disgrace and it gets worse every year.”

A separate complaint reportedly referenced Serena Williams, who made a brief appearance during the show, alleging that her “crip-walking” promoted “gang affiliation.”

Despite the backlash, Lamar's halftime appearance was met with widespread critical acclaim and quickly became the most-watched Super Bowl Halftime Show in history. His performance also served as a defining moment in his GNX album era, which debuted atop the chart dated Dec. 7, 2024, and returned to the top on the Feb. 22-dated chart in the wake of its physical release and Lamar's Super Bowl LIX halftime show (Feb. 9).

; 1235932402 New Billy Joel Documentary 'And So It Goes' to Air on HBO https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/new-billy-joel-documentary-and-so-it-goes-to-air-hbo-1235932391/Tyler Jenke Thu, 27 Mar 2025 04:29:28 +0000 MusicMusic NewsBilly Joelgenre rockjane fonda https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932391 "I believe this two-part film is both a revelation and a surprise,” said director Susan Lacy.

A new documentary about Billy Joel is set to air on HBO this summer, it has been confirmed.

As Deadline reports, the two-part series, titled And So It Goes , will be produced and directed by Susan Lacy, who is best known as the creator of the long-running American Master s, and for directing HBO documentaries such as Jane Fonda in Five Acts and Spielberg . Producer Jessica Levin – who produced the latter documentaries – is also slated to co-direct.

The forthcoming documentary is reportedly set to provide “an expansive portrait of the life and music of Billy Joel,” while focusing on the love, loss, and personal struggles that have informed his creative process. Filmmakers have also been given access to previously unseen performances, home movies, and photographs for the production.

“For those who think they know Joel's story, as well as those who are not as familiar, I believe this two-part film is both a revelation and a surprise,” Lacy stated in a press release. “I was drawn to his story as someone who knew little at the outset, and was astounded at how autobiographical his songs are and how complex his story is.”

Billy Joel: And So It Goes arrives via Lacy and Levin's Pentimento Production, Sean Hayes and Todd Milliner's Hazy Mills Productions, and Tom Hanks and Gary Goetzman's Playtone for HBO Documentary Films. The documentary also credits Hanks, Goetzman, Milliner, Hayes, Steve Cohen, Nancy Abraham, Lisa Heller and Sara Rodriguez as executive producers

News of the documentary also comes just weeks after Joel announced he would be postponing a number of tour dates due to a need for recovery and physical therapy necessitated by a recent surgery for an undisclosed medical condition

“While I regret postponing any shows, my health must come first,” Joel said in a statement posted to Instagram. “I look forward to getting back on stage and sharing the joy of live music with our amazing fans. Thank you for your understanding.”

Joel will return to the stage at Acrisure Stadium in Pittsburgh on July 5.

; 1235932391 Children of Dean and Gene Ween Announce Live Performance: 'We Are Not Ween' https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/children-dean-gene-ween-live-performance-1235932384/Tyler Jenke Thu, 27 Mar 2025 03:34:27 +0000 MusicMusic Newsdean weengene weengenre rockween https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932384 "Come and witness the genetic duo merge our sounds," urged Michael Melchiondo.

The respective children of Dean Ween (aka Mickey Melchiondo) and Gene Ween (aka Aaron Freeman) are set to perform together this weekend, but make no mistake, the duo are adamant they “are not Ween.”

The performance was announced on social media on Tuesday (March 26) by Michael Melchiondo, who also performs as Bugger . The event takes place on Saturday (March 29) at the Soupcon Gallery in Lambertville, NJ, and features Hover and Rubix Pube on a lineup that also names Ashton Freeman.

“My good friend Ashton Freeman has asked me to join them in playing a show this Saturday in Lambertville,” Melchiondo. “We've come up with a very unique collaborative set. So come and witness the genetic duo merge our sounds… We are Not Ween.”

The pair have previously made music separately, with Melchiondo sharing a photo of his father on social media last week, pairing it with the caption, “in the studio with dad, feeling great and making music.” His current project includes Bugger, while previous music was also released under the name Veal Marsala . Freeman, meanwhile, has released a small handful of releases under their own name between 2016 and 2020.

Ween were first formed by the elder Melchiondo and Freeman in 1984 as teenagers, with a large array of independent releases preceding the arrival of debut album GodWeenSatan: The Oneness in 1990. The group would largely escape widespread commercial success over the next 22 years, with final album – 2007's La Cucaracha – giving them their career peak of No. 69 on the Billboard 200.

The group would announce their disbandment in 2012, though reformed again in 2015. In late 2023, it was announced that Ween would undertake a 40th anniversary tour the following year that would also double as a 30th birthday celebration for their fourth album, Chocolate and Cheese .

A number of those tour dates were cancelled in March 2024, with Dean Ween citing a need to preserve his “mental and spiritual wellbeing.” The band would later return to the road, though they announced in August that “Ween must make the decision to step away from the stage for the foreseeable future,” adding that “it's become clear that touring and performing is too taxing on Deaner's mental health to continue.”

Currently, no further news in regard to Ween's return to the live stage has been announced.

; 1235932384 Sublime Working With Travis Barker for First New Album Since 1996 https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/sublime-working-travis-barker-first-new-album-since-1996-1235932377/Tyler Jenke Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:52:00 +0000 MusicMusic NewsBlink-182Bradley Nowellgenre rocksublimetravis barker https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932377 “Travis is an old-school fan and scholar of the Sublime catalog,” Jakob Nowell says.

Almost three decades after the release of their final album, a newly-active Sublime have revealed they're currently in the studio working on a new record.

The group, which disbanded in 1996 following the passing of frontman Bradley Nowell, found themselves active once again in late 2023 when it was reported Nowell's son Jakob was fronting the group. Following live performances at the likes of the Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival in 2024, the group have now told Rolling Stone the reformation is set to feature a new record.

The 29-year-old explained that he had recently spent a week working with Blink-182 drummer Travis Barker and producer John Feldmann penning tracks for the new album. Founding members Eric Wilson and Bud Gaugh will reportedly join for recording sessions soon.

“Travis is an old-school fan and scholar of the Sublime catalog,” Nowell said. “They feel like family members now too, man. There was that feeling from everyone that what we're doing here is something generational and special on an emotional, spiritual, familial level.”

In a statement, Barker noted that the project was “going to be really special,” with the spirit of the group's late frontman still present within the band. “Bradley comes through his son Jakob,” he added. “Chills every day in the studio when he sings and plays guitar.”

Cynical fans who might be expecting the album to be a poor imitation of what was once was have also had their fears assuaged somewhat, with Nowell specifically noting that the plan isn't to create a modern, updated version of the band. “No, just more of a solid respect and homage to the works of Sublime,” he says.

Wilson and Gaugh co-founded Sublime with the late Bradley Nowell in 1988, with the group's first two albums – 1992's 40oz. to Freedom and 1994's Robbin' the Hood – released on the independent Skunk Records label, which Nowell co-founded.

Nowell died of a heroin overdose in May 1996 at the age of 28, just two months before the release of their self-titled major label debut. The record would peak at No. 13 on the Billboard 200, while lead single “What I Got” would top the Alternative Airplay chart in August 1996. Their sole Hot 100 entry came by way of “Doin' Time” in December 1997, when it hit No. 87.

In 2009, Wilson and Gaugh reunited under the Sublime name with vocalist Rome Ramirez. Use of the band's name was denied by the Nowell estate, leading to the creation of Sublime With Rome, which would continue with varying lineups until their official dissolution in 2024.

In May 2024, the reformed Sublime issued the track “Feels Like That,” which features Stick Figure alongside vocals from both Bradley and Jakob Nowell. According to Jakob's latest comments, this archival discovery process has been integral to his new role up the front of thee acclaimed band.

“We're combing through and trying to distill down what makes a Sublime song a Sublime song,” he explained. “It's been this fun learning process to get close to and get to know my lost family member in a spiritual sense. I think we leave so much of ourselves, like this blueprint of our DNA, in the work that we create and put out there. So really it's been also a fact-finding mission.”

; 1235932377 LE SSERAFIM Scores Second No. 1 on Top Album Sales With 'HOT' https://www.billboard.com/music/chart-beat/le-sserafim-second-number-one-top-album-sales-hot-1235932332/Keith Caulfield Thu, 27 Mar 2025 02:23:22 +0000 Chart BeatMusicBillboardgenre popMusic NewsNewsTop Album Sales https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235932332 Plus: Playboi Carti, Coheed and Cambria, Steven Wilson, Charli xcx and Charlie Charley Crocket debut in the top 10.

LE SSERAFIM scores its second No. 1 on Billboard ’s Top Album Sales chart (dated March 29) as the ensemble's new HOT debuts atop the tally. The set sold 38,500 copies in the US in the week ending March 20, according to Luminate, marking the best sales week yet for the act. It's the fifth top 10 in total for the group, which previously reached No. 1 with its last chart entry, 2024's Crazy .

Also debuting in the top 10 of the latest Top Album Sales chart: new releases from Playboi Carti, Coheed and Cambria, Steven Wilson, Charli xcx and Charley Crockett.

Billboard ’s Top Album Sales chart ranks the top-selling albums of the week based only on traditional album sales. The chart's history dates back to May 25, 1991, the first week Billboard began tabulating charts with electronically monitored piece count information from SoundScan, now Luminate. Pure album sales were the sole measurement utilized by the Billboard 200 albums chart through the list dated Dec. 6, 2014, after which that chart switched to a methodology that blends album sales with track equivalent album (TEA) units and streaming equivalent album (SEA) units.

The first-week sales of LE SSERAFIM's Crazy were bolstered by its availability across more than 20 CD variants (all containing collectible paper ephemera, some randomized). 98% of the album's first-week sales were from CD purchases. (The album was only available to buy as a CD and a digital download.)

Lady Gaga's MAYHEM falls to No. 2 with 24,000 sold (down 82%) after debuting at No. 1 a week ago.

Playboi Carti's MUSIC debuts at No. 3 with 14,500 copies sold – the rapper's best sales week. It was available to purchase only as a digital download in its opening week – a widely available standard 30-song set, as well as three variants exclusive to the artist's official webstore (the variants each have between one or two bonus tracks each).

Kendrick Lamar's chart-topping GNX climbs 6-4 with nearly 13,000 sold (though down 18%).

Coheed and Cambria clocks its 11th top 10-charting effort on Top Album Sales, as the rock outfit's latest album The Father of Make Believe bows at No. 5 with 12,000 sold. Its first-week sales were aided by the album's availability across five vinyl variants, a CD, a widely available download edition and two cassette tapes.

Sabrina Carpenter's former No. 1 Short n' Sweet rises a rung to No. 6 with 10,000 sold (though down 13%).

Steven Wilson lands his first top 10-charting set on Top Album Sales as his new studio effort The Overview enters at No. 7 with nearly 10,000 sold – his best sales week since 2015. The album was available in three vinyl variants, a standard CD, a deluxe boxed set, a blu-ray audio, a cassette tape and two download editions.

Charli xcx's remix album Brat and It's Completely Different – comprising only remixes of material from her Brat studio album – debuts at No. 8 with just over 8,000 sold, solely from vinyl sales.

Chappell Roan's former leader The Rise and Fall of a Midwest Princess dips 8-9 on Top Album Sales with 8,000 sold (down 8%).

Charley Crockett rounds out the top 10 with his new album, Lonesome Drifter , debuting at No. 10 with nearly 8,000 sold – his best sales week ever. It's the first top 10 for the artist, and eighth charting set overall. The set was available across four vinyl variants (including a signed edition), a standard CD, download and a cassette tape.
